verses.verse: בָּרֲכִ֥י <S%H1288><s%> Bless נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> O my soul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְה֫וָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱ֭לֹהַי <S%H430><s%> my God גָּדַ֣לְתָּ <S%H1431><s%> great מְּאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> thou art very ה֭וֹד <S%H1935><s%> with honour וְהָדָ֣ר <S%H1926><s%> and majesty לָבָֽשְׁתָּ׃ <S%H3847><s%> thou art clothed

עֹֽטֶה־ <S%H5844><s%> Who coverest א֭וֹר <S%H216><s%> [thyself] with light כַּשַּׂלְמָ֑ה <S%H8008><s%> as [with] a garment נוֹטֶ֥ה <S%H5186><s%> who stretchest out שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם <S%H8064><s%> the heavens כַּיְרִיעָֽה׃ <S%H3407><s%> like a curtain

הַ֥מְקָרֶֽה <S%H7136><s%> Who layeth the beams בַמַּ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> in the waters עֲ‍ֽלִיּ֫וֹתָ֥יו <S%H5944><s%> of his chambers הַשָּׂם־ <S%H7760><s%> who maketh עָבִ֥ים <S%H5645><s%> the clouds רְכוּב֑וֹ <S%H7398><s%> his chariot הַֽ֝מְהַלֵּ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> who walketh עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon כַּנְפֵי־ <S%H3671><s%> upon the wings רֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> of the wind
עֹשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> Who maketh מַלְאָכָ֣יו <S%H4397><s%> his angels רוּח֑וֹת <S%H7307><s%> spirits מְ֝שָׁרְתָ֗יו <S%H8334><s%> his ministers אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire לֹהֵֽט׃ <S%H3857><s%> a flaming

יָֽסַד־ <S%H3254><s%> add אֶ֭רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon מְכוֹנֶ֑יהָ <S%H4349><s%> the foundations בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> that it will not תִּ֝מּ֗וֹט <S%H4131><s%> [that] it should not be removed עוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> forever וָעֶֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> and ever

תְּ֭הוֹם <S%H8415><s%> it with the deep כַּלְּב֣וּשׁ <S%H3830><s%> as [with] a garment כִּסִּית֑וֹ <S%H3680><s%> Thou coveredst עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above הָ֝רִ֗ים <S%H2022><s%> above the mountains יַֽעַמְדוּ־ <S%H5975><s%> stood מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> the waters

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> At גַּעֲרָ֣תְךָ֣ <S%H1606><s%> thy rebuke יְנוּס֑וּן <S%H5127><s%> they fled מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> At ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> at the voice רַֽ֝עַמְךָ֗ <S%H7482><s%> of thy thunder יֵחָפֵזֽוּן׃ <S%H2648><s%> they hasted

יַעֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> They go up הָ֭רִים <S%H2022><s%> by the mountains יֵרְד֣וּ <S%H3381><s%> they go down בְקָע֑וֹת <S%H1237><s%> by the valleys אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְ֝ק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> unto the place זֶ֤ה ׀ <S%H2088><s%> which יָסַ֬דְתָּ <S%H3245><s%> thou hast founded לָהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

גְּֽבוּל־ <S%H1366><s%> a bound שַׂ֭מְתָּ <S%H7760><s%> Thou hast set בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> may not יַֽעֲבֹר֑וּן <S%H5674><s%> that they may not pass over בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> they will not יְ֝שׁוּב֗וּן <S%H7725><s%> that they turn not again לְכַסּ֥וֹת <S%H3680><s%> to cover הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth

הַֽמְשַׁלֵּ֣חַ <S%H7971><s%> He sendeth מַ֭עְיָנִים <S%H4599><s%> the springs בַּנְּחָלִ֑ים <S%H5158><s%> into the valleys בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between הָ֝רִ֗ים <S%H2022><s%> among the hills יְהַלֵּכֽוּן׃ <S%H1980><s%> [which] run

יַ֭שְׁקוּ <S%H8248><s%> They give drink כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> to every חַיְת֣וֹ <S%H2416><s%> to every beast שָׂדָ֑י <S%H7704><s%> of the field יִשְׁבְּר֖וּ <S%H7665><s%> quench פְרָאִ֣ים <S%H6501><s%> the wild asses צְמָאָֽם׃ <S%H6772><s%> their thirst

עֲ֭לֵיהֶם <S%H5921><s%> Beside עוֹף־ <S%H5775><s%> By them shall the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the heaven יִשְׁכּ֑וֹן <S%H7931><s%> have their habitation מִבֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> among עֳ֝פָאיִ֗ם <S%H6073><s%> the branches יִתְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> lift קֽוֹל׃ <S%H6963><s%> up voices

מַשְׁקֶ֣ה <S%H8248><s%> He watereth הָ֭רִים <S%H2022><s%> the hills מֵעֲלִיּוֹתָ֑יו <S%H5944><s%> from his chambers מִפְּרִ֥י <S%H6529><s%> with the fruit מַ֝עֲשֶׂ֗יךָ <S%H4639><s%> of thy works תִּשְׂבַּ֥ע <S%H7646><s%> is satisfied הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth

מַצְמִ֤יחַ <S%H6779><s%> to grow חָצִ֨יר ׀ <S%H2682><s%> He causeth the grass לַבְּהֵמָ֗ה <S%H929><s%> for the cattle וְ֭עֵשֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> and herb לַעֲבֹדַ֣ת <S%H5656><s%> for the service הָאָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> of man לְה֥וֹצִיא <S%H3318><s%> that he may bring forth לֶ֝֗חֶם <S%H3899><s%> food מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> out of the earth

וְיַ֤יִן ׀ <S%H3196><s%> And wine יְשַׂמַּ֬ח <S%H8055><s%> [that] maketh glad לְֽבַב־ <S%H3824><s%> the heart אֱנ֗וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> of man לְהַצְהִ֣יל <S%H6670><s%> to shine פָּנִ֣ים <S%H6440><s%> to make [his] face מִשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> [and] oil וְ֝לֶ֗חֶם <S%H3899><s%> and bread לְֽבַב־ <S%H3824><s%> heart אֱנ֥וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> man's יִסְעָֽד׃ <S%H5582><s%> [which] strengtheneth

יִ֭שְׂבְּעוּ <S%H7646><s%> are full עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> The trees יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אַֽרְזֵ֥י <S%H730><s%> [of sap] the cedars לְ֝בָנ֗וֹן <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נָטָֽע׃ <S%H5193><s%> which he hath planted

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after שָׁ֭ם <S%H8033><s%> in it צִפֳּרִ֣ים <S%H6833><s%> Where the birds יְקַנֵּ֑נוּ <S%H7077><s%> make their nests חֲ֝סִידָ֗ה <S%H2624><s%> [as for] the stork בְּרוֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H1265><s%> the fir trees בֵּיתָֽהּ׃ <S%H1004><s%> [are] her house

הָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> hills הַ֭גְּבֹהִים <S%H1364><s%> The high לַיְּעֵלִ֑ים <S%H3277><s%> for the wild goats סְ֝לָעִ֗ים <S%H5553><s%> [and] the rocks מַחְסֶ֥ה <S%H4268><s%> [are] a refuge לַֽשְׁפַנִּֽים׃ <S%H8227><s%> for the conies

עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> He appointed יָ֭רֵחַ <S%H3394><s%> the moon לְמוֹעֲדִ֑ים <S%H4150><s%> for seasons שֶׁ֝֗מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> the sun יָדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> knoweth מְבוֹאֽוֹ׃ <S%H3996><s%> his going down

תָּֽשֶׁת־ <S%H7896><s%> Thou makest חֹ֭שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> darkness וִ֣יהִי <S%H1961><s%> becomes לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> and it is night בּֽוֹ־ תִ֝רְמֹ֗שׂ <S%H7430><s%> do creep כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חַיְתוֹ־ <S%H2416><s%> wherein all the beasts יָֽעַר׃ <S%H3293><s%> of the forest

הַ֭כְּפִירִים <S%H3715><s%> The young lions שֹׁאֲגִ֣ים <S%H7580><s%> roar לַטָּ֑רֶף <S%H2964><s%> after their prey וּלְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> and seek מֵאֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> from God אָכְלָֽם׃ <S%H400><s%> their meat

תִּזְרַ֣ח <S%H2224><s%> ariseth הַ֭שֶּׁמֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> The sun יֵאָסֵפ֑וּן <S%H622><s%> they gather themselves together וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in מְ֝עוֹנֹתָ֗ם <S%H4585><s%> in their dens יִרְבָּצֽוּן׃ <S%H7257><s%> and lay them down

יֵצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> goeth forth אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> Man לְפָעֳל֑וֹ <S%H6467><s%> unto his work וְֽלַעֲבֹ֖דָת֣וֹ <S%H5656><s%> and to his labour עֲדֵי־ <S%H5703><s%> eternity עָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the evening

מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> how רַבּ֬וּ <S%H7231><s%> how manifold מַעֲשֶׂ֨יךָ ׀ <S%H4639><s%> are thy works יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD כֻּ֭לָּם <S%H3605><s%> all בְּחָכְמָ֣ה <S%H2451><s%> in wisdom עָשִׂ֑יתָ <S%H6213><s%> hast thou made מָלְאָ֥ה <S%H4390><s%> is full הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> them all the earth קִנְיָנֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7075><s%> of thy riches

זֶ֤ה ׀ <S%H2088><s%> There הַיָּ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> sea גָּדוֹל֮ <S%H1419><s%> [So is] this great וּרְחַ֪ב <S%H7342><s%> and broad יָ֫דָ֥יִם <S%H3027><s%> In שָֽׁם־ <S%H8033><s%> which רֶ֭מֶשׂ <S%H7431><s%> wherein [are] things creeping וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> without מִסְפָּ֑ר <S%H4557><s%> innumerable חַיּ֥וֹת <S%H2416><s%> beasts קְ֝טַנּ֗וֹת <S%H6996><s%> both small עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with גְּדֹלֽוֹת׃ <S%H1419><s%> and great

שָׁ֭ם <S%H8033><s%> There אֳנִיּ֣וֹת <S%H591><s%> the ships יְהַלֵּכ֑וּן <S%H1980><s%> There go לִ֝וְיָתָ֗ן <S%H3882><s%> [there is] that leviathan זֶֽה־ <S%H2088><s%> which יָצַ֥רְתָּ <S%H3335><s%> [whom] thou hast made לְשַֽׂחֶק־ <S%H7832><s%> to play בּֽוֹ׃

כֻּ֭לָּם <S%H3605><s%> all אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> about יְשַׂבֵּר֑וּן <S%H7663><s%> These wait לָתֵ֖ת <S%H5414><s%> all upon thee that thou mayest give אָכְלָ֣ם <S%H400><s%> [them] their meat בְּעִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H6256><s%> in due season

תִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> [That] thou givest לָ֭הֶם <S%H1992><s%> they יִלְקֹט֑וּן <S%H3950><s%> them they gather תִּפְתַּ֥ח <S%H6605><s%> thou openest יָֽ֝דְךָ֗ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand יִשְׂבְּע֥וּן <S%H7646><s%> they are filled טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> with good

תַּסְתִּ֥יר <S%H5641><s%> Thou hidest פָּנֶיךָ֮ <S%H6440><s%> thy face יִֽבָּהֵ֫ל֥וּן <S%H926><s%> they are troubled תֹּסֵ֣ף <S%H622><s%> thou takest away ר֭וּחָם <S%H7307><s%> their breath יִגְוָע֑וּן <S%H1478><s%> they die וְֽאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֲפָרָ֥ם <S%H6083><s%> to their dust יְשׁוּבֽוּן׃ <S%H7725><s%> and return

תְּשַׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> Thou sendest ר֭וּחֲךָ <S%H7307><s%> forth thy spirit יִבָּרֵא֑וּן <S%H1254><s%> they are created וּ֝תְחַדֵּ֗שׁ <S%H2318><s%> and thou renewest פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> the face אֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> of the earth

יְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> endure כְב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> The glory יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> shall endure for ever יִשְׂמַ֖ח <S%H8055><s%> shall rejoice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּמַעֲשָֽׂיו׃ <S%H4639><s%> in his works

הַמַּבִּ֣יט <S%H5027><s%> He looketh לָ֭אָרֶץ <S%H776><s%> on the earth וַתִּרְעָ֑ד <S%H7460><s%> and it trembleth יִגַּ֖ע <S%H5060><s%> he toucheth בֶּהָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> the hills וְֽיֶעֱשָֽׁנוּ׃ <S%H6225><s%> and they smoke

אָשִׁ֣ירָה <S%H7891><s%> I will sing לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD בְּחַיָּ֑י <S%H2416><s%> as long as I live אֲזַמְּרָ֖ה <S%H2167><s%> I will sing לֵאלֹהַ֣י <S%H430><s%> praise to my God בְּעוֹדִֽי׃ <S%H5750><s%> while I have my being

יֶעֱרַ֣ב <S%H6149><s%> of him shall be sweet עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> and שִׂיחִ֑י <S%H7879><s%> My meditation אָ֝נֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> I אֶשְׂמַ֥ח <S%H8055><s%> I will be glad בַּיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD

יִתַּ֤מּוּ <S%H8552><s%> be consumed חַטָּאִ֨ים ׀ <S%H2400><s%> Let the sinners מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָ֡רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the earth וּרְשָׁעִ֤ים ׀ <S%H7563><s%> and let the wicked ע֤וֹד <S%H5750><s%> more אֵינָ֗ם <S%H369><s%> be no בָּרֲכִ֣י <S%H1288><s%> be no more Bless נַ֭פְשִׁי <S%H5315><s%> O my soul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> thou the LORD הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD
